attributes.action: We feel that accepting 20000 refugees is not enough. The UK should be doing more
attributes.background: Due to issues of war, there are more refugees trying to escape to Europe. The UK should be doing more to protect the human rights of refugees, and be accepting more into the country

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/105991

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
